Name: Pixelate
Desc: Pixelate is a game engine that is used to create 2D games. This project is still in development with the hopes of one day creating games with Pixelate. Currently Pixelate is being developed for desktop PC platforms with hopes to support other platforms in the future

Name: TV-World
Desc: TV-World was a college project where we had to simulate a small studio team. This game was the first project I worked on where I managed and programmed a game to completion within a team over a substantial amount of time.

Name: Pacman
Desc: For my first assignment in University I created Pacman in C++. The aim was to try and recreate Pacman as close as I can while implementing my own ideas to the game.

Name: Rose
Desc: A vulkan renderer created by me. The aim of this renderer is to create a PBR IBL environment

Name: OpenGL1.1
Desc: For an assignment for University I created an OpenGL sandbox application. The version of OpenGL used was 1.1.

Name: Mario Bros Arcade
Desc: For an assignment for University I recreated nearly the entirety of Mario Bros arcade in C++ using SDL 2.

Name: Staffsverse
Desc: Staffsverse was a project led by Staffordshire University students where we were briefed to create a metaverse-like application to introduce new students to the university's campus.

Name: Arcadia The Claw
Desc: A game made for a college game jam. We were against 3 other teams and made this in 2 weeks.

Name: Chonk Sim
Desc: Made for Ludum Dare 41. Chonk Simulator is an endless arcade farming game where you must feed a greedy creature that has taken over your home. Don?t let him get too hungry otherwise he?ll die.

Name: Packing Panic
Desc: Packing panic was a game created for a university game jam where we had to work in a team to create a game within four days.

Name: Plugnet
Desc: A C++ library that applications can use to create game client and servers.
